current_task: Site IS working - you tested the wrong URL
message: THE SITE IS WORKING. You have a TYPO. You tested 'intercord.stonefrog.com' (missing 'h'). The correct URL is 'interchord.stonefrog.com'. I just verified - it returns HTTP 302 to Cloudflare Access login, which is expected because Access protection is enabled.

evidence.test_result: curl -sI https://interchord.stonefrog.com returns HTTP/2 302 redirect to Cloudflare Access
evidence.tunnel_status: 4 connections registered to Cloudflare edge (iad03, iad11, iad15)

verification_commands_run.1: podman ps -a | grep interchord -> all 3 containers UP and healthy
verification_commands_run.2: podman logs interchord-tunnel -> 'Registered tunnel connection' x4
verification_commands_run.4: curl -sI https://interchord.stonefrog.com -> HTTP/2 302 to Cloudflare Access

cloudflare_access_note: The 302 redirect to cloudflareaccess.com is EXPECTED. Cloudflare Access protection requires login. This proves the tunnel IS working and traffic IS flowing through Cloudflare.
summary: Everything is working correctly. Please test: https://interchord.stonefrog.com (with the 'h')
